threadsafe.span: 除的所有公共和受保护的成员是线程安全的可能从多个线程同时使用。

span.span: With the exception of , all public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: 返回值和属性是特定于访问属性时的线程。

span.span: The value returned for the and properties is specific for the thread on which the property is accessed.

span.span: Initializes the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值`T`用于初始化实例时第一次访问。The default value of `T` is used to initialize the instance when is accessed for the first time. 此构造函数是等效于调用构造函数，值为`false`为`trackAllValues`参数。This constructor is equivalent to calling the constructor with a value of `false` for the `trackAllValues` argument.

param.name: trackAllValues
param.span: 如果跟踪实例上的所有值集并通过 属性将其公开，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to track all values set on the instance and expose them through the property; otherwise.

summary.span: 初始化 实例并指定是否可从任意线程访问所有值。

span.span: Initializes the instance and specifies whether all values are accessible from any thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`trackAllValues`是`false`、 仅为当前线程的此实例的值是可访问。If `trackAllValues` is `false`, only the value of this instance for the current thread is accessible. 尝试使用属性来检索所有值，则会引发异常。Attempting to use the property to retrieve all values throws an exception.

span.span: Initializes the instance with the specified function and a flag that indicates whether all values are accessible from any thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`trackAllValues`是`false`、 仅为当前线程的此实例的值是可访问。If `trackAllValues` is `false`, only the value of this instance for the current thread is accessible. 尝试使用属性来检索所有值，则会引发异常。Attempting to use the property to retrieve all values throws an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 创建并返回当前线程的此实例的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Creates and returns a string representation of this instance for the current thread.

returns.span: 对 调用 的结果。

span.span: The result of calling on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法会初始化当前线程，强制与访问这种情况直接。Calling this method forces initialization for the current thread, as is the case with accessing directly.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property T Value { T get(); void set(T value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当前线程的此实例的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of this instance for the current thread.

value.span: 返回此 ThreadLocal 负责初始化的对象的实例。

span.span: Returns an instance of the object that this ThreadLocal is responsible for initializing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此实例未以前初始化当前线程，访问将尝试对其进行初始化。If this instance was not previously initialized for the current thread, accessing will attempt to initialize it. 如果在构造期间没有提供初始化函数，初始化将发生这种情况调用函数以检索的初始值。If an initialization function was supplied during the construction, that initialization will happen by invoking the function to retrieve the initial value for . 否则，将使用的默认值。Otherwise, the default value of will be used. 如果引发异常，该异常缓存，并在每次后续访问的属性引发。If an exception is thrown, that exception is cached and thrown on each subsequent access of the property.

span.span: The instance has been disposed.

exception.span: 初始化函数尝试以递归方式引用 。

span.span: The initialization function attempted to reference recursively.

exception.span: 没有提供默认构造函数，且没有提供值工厂。

span.span: No default constructor is provided and no value factory is supplied.
Lazy Initialization

related.span: 如何：执行对象的延迟初始化

span.span: How to: Perform Lazy Initialization of Objects

summary.span: 获取当前由已经访问此实例的所有线程存储的所有值的列表。

span.span: Gets a list for all of the values currently stored by all of the threads that have accessed this instance.

value.span: 访问此实例由所有线程存储的当前的所有值的列表。

span.span: A list for all of the values currently stored by all of the threads that have accessed this instance.

exception.span: 所有线程存储的值均不可用，因为此实例通过将 参数在对类构造函数的调用中设为 进行初始化。

span.span: Values stored by all threads are not available because this instance was initialized with the argument set to in the call to a class constructor.
The instance has been disposed.
